name: Roses
lyrics:
[ti:Roses]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/ROZES]
[al:Roses]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Roses - The Chainsmokers/ROZES (腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权)
[00:02.85]Lyrics by：Andrew Taggart/Elizabeth Mencel
[00:05.70]Composed by：Andrew Taggart/Elizabeth Mencel
[00:08.55]Produced by：The Chainsmokers
[00:11.40]Taking it slow but it's not typical (可以慢慢接受但不要太过温吞)
[00:15.89]He already knows that my love is fire (他早已清楚我的爱恰似炙热焰火)
[00:20.69]His heart was a stone but then his hands roam (他铁石心肠 而他的手早将我揽入怀)
[00:25.54]I turned him to gold and took him higher (他成了耀眼的金色 一切变得那么美好)
[00:30.30]Well I'll be your daydream I'll be your favorite things (而我是他渴望拥有的白日梦 我会是他最珍视的爱)
[00:36.32]We could be beautiful (我们会更加美好)
[00:39.82]Get drunk on the good life I'll take you to paradise (就让我们沉醉这完美的生活 我会带你去往伊甸乐园)
[00:44.91]
[00:45.85]Say you'll never let me go (向我许诺 你绝不会任我离去)
[00:48.81]Deep in my bones I can feel you (灵魂深处也能感受你的气息)
[00:50.62]Take me back to a time only we knew (带我重回过往 我们深知只有你和我)
[00:52.89]Hideaway (一起的时光)
[00:53.49]
[00:58.25]We could waste the night with an old film (一部老电影 我们相守这个夜晚)
[00:59.97]Smoke a little w**d on my couch in the back room (窝在我的沙发里 抽些**)
[01:02.33]Hideaway (只有我们)
